name: Critical Illness Plan
description: itical illness insurance offers coverage against several types of life-threatening ailments and lifestyle diseases, such as cancer, stroke, and kidney failure.

name: Cancer Insurance
description: Cancer insurance is a type of insurance designed to manage the costs associated with cancer. This policy helps mitigate the costs related to getting quality treatment for cancer.

name: Personal Accident Insurance
description: Personal accident insurance is a policy that can provide you with financial protection against uncertainties such as accidental death, injuries, and partial or total disability resulting from an accident.

name: Health Insurance Plans
description: Health insurance is meant to provide financial cover against hospitalization costs, prescription fees, medical bills, etc.

name: Long-Term Care Insurance
description: Provides coverage for the costs of care in the event of a chronic illness or disability.

name: Family Health Insurance Plan
description: Covers all members of a family and provides comprehensive coverage at a lower cost than individual plans.

name: Heart Insurance plan
description: Offers additional benefits like dental and vision coverage, as well as prescription drug coverage.

name: Maternity Health Insurance
description: Insurance for maternity offers a safety net for expecting mothers and their newborn babies that covers delivery-related expenses during the most joyous phase of life.

name: Senior citizen health insurance
description: Senior Citizen Health Insurance makes it easier for old age people to pay for medical expenses arising due to treatment. It could be a thoughtful present to your ageing parents as it provides a safety cushion while they age.

name: Diabetic Patient Health Insurance
description: Offers tax advantages and helps cover healthcare costs for those who are self-employed.
